Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to tax preparation and voter registration software
Summary: Requires that all electronic tax preparation software offered for sale in the state of New York include a prompt providing a link to users of such software to a New York state voter registration application website.
LawCode: Amd ยง171, Tax L; add ยง5-231, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the election law, in relation to requiring tax preparation software to provide a link to voter registration websites
